name: Siryou no yasiki ~The Cursed House~
description:
It is a game the Japanese fear. And I will scare the world from now on.
I will develop this game as a series.Looking for a really scary game, it will satisfy you like watching a movie.
I made great fear possible to play free of charge.
A sequel is under development at the moment.
Producers are poor and can not eat rice.
I am very thankful that you can donate to this game development.
